definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
abbr. for 柬埔寨[Jian3 pu3 zhai4], Cambodia
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北歐劍士裝備極爲精良，身穿鍊甲或板甲。

sentences.english: The oxygen autogenous smelting process of nickeliferous copper concentrate from Jinchuan Nonferrous Corp. is thermodynamically analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對金川二次銅精礦氧氣自熱熔鍊過程進行熱力學分析。

sentences.english: That is the length of anklet that is optimal.
sentences.chinese: 這是長度腳鍊是最優的。

sentences.english: Weld less chain shaped in a figure 8 pattern.
sentences.chinese: 焊縫少鍊形在圖8的模式。

sentences.english: In this article, the author puts forward a comparatively simple method to calculate the resistance in recurrent circuit by difference equation.
sentences.chinese: 而用差分方程來直接計算鍊形電路的電阻，比較簡單。

sentences.english: The Golden Shadow crystal sparkles on a rose gold-plated chain.
sentences.chinese: 黃金影子玫瑰鍍金鍊晶體閃爍。

sentences.english: Reduced the cooldown on Northrend Alchemy Research from 7 days to 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 諾森德鍊金學研究的冷卻時間從7天降低到3天。

sentences.english: The most general lightning is the linear lightning, others are sphere lightning and chain lightning.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的是線形閃電，還有球形和鍊形的。

sentences.english: Enterprise will be stuck in stagnation and even bankruptcy if capital chain is broken.
sentences.chinese: 企業資金鍊的斷裂會使企業陷入困境甚至破產。

sentences.english: Italian crossbow militia, armoured with mail and a pavise.
sentences.chinese: 巨盾持弩民兵裝備鍊甲和全身巨盾。

sentences.english: The black satin cord secures the pendant and ensures maximum comfort.
sentences.chinese: 黑色蠟封棉繩堅固鍊墜又令你佩戴舒適。

sentences.english: The four resistors are connected in series, making a chain known as a potential divider, or voltage divider.
sentences.chinese: 四個電阻串聯接在一起，形成一個鍊形的分壓電路。

sentences.english: Complete this on-trend look with the matching pendant or clip earrings.
sentences.chinese: 和同款鍊墜或夾式耳環搭配，打造本季的最時尚造型。

sentences.english: Complemented with a rhodium plated chain.
Expansion excessively peer questioned by the chain - Shun Chi funds?
sentences.chinese: 擴張過速遭同行質疑順馳資金鍊終端何在？

sentences.english: These soldiers are equipped with a sword and large shield and wear mail armour for protection.
sentences.chinese: 劍士們身穿鍊甲，手持長劍巨盾，作戰頗爲出色。

definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to engrave (on wood or stone)/to inscribe
guard (on a sword handle)/pommel (on a sword handle)/dagger/Taiwan pr. [tan2]
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
